testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I should be able to update the visitor purpose information registered in the
testcase.name: A PATCH request to the "/api/visitorsPurposeUpdate" endpoint with valid authorization and correct
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/visitorsPurposeUpdate" path parameters.............passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request containing 766, "purpose update" and "purpose details" information to send to the api visitorsPurposeUpdate endpoint..passed * The api user sends a PATCH request and saves the returned response........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success"..passed * The api user verifies that the updateid information in the Response body is the same as the id information in the patch request body.passed
